meanings.definition: Buildings or structures made of stone.
meanings.sent1: The ancient castle was a magnificent stoneworks.
meanings.sent2: The stoneworks of the cathedral were admired by all.
meanings.sent3: The stoneworks of the fortress seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as the stoneworks of a castle.
meanings.sent5: The stoneworks of the bridge stood strong against the raging river.

meanings.definition: The craft or technique of working with stone.
meanings.sent1: The artisan's skill in stoneworks was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: Learning stoneworks requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy apprentice turned the stoneworks into a comical mess.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in stoneworks was a masterpiece of art.
meanings.sent5: The stoneworks of the sculptor breathed life into the cold stone.

meanings.definition: A collection of stone sculptures or carvings.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a stunning stoneworks from ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The artist's studio was filled with beautiful stoneworks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the delicate stoneworks.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a gallery of memories, each a unique stoneworks.
meanings.sent5: The stoneworks in the garden added a touch of elegance to the surroundings.
